Html:
Devs,

I wanted to take the time to say thank you for all your hard work in the past and current Rawr versions. Your work on this project has gone a long way to helping my toons. I have on many occations when people ask me "Which is better" or "How do I gem". I have refereed them to Rawr to teach them to "fish" rather then feeding them for the day.

 

Right now I have a little morning ritual of checking the Source Code looking for ProtPally updates then over to wow site to see hot fix notes then finally log into wow and do dailies.

 

So have a good day, drink lots of coffee, and know that for everyone that makes a "Thank You" post their are 100's of others too shy to post.

 

Cya in game!
